content.text: Match ends, Manchester United 4, Everton 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester United 4, Everton 0.
Goal!  Manchester United 4, Everton 0. Anthony Martial (Manchester United) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Morgan Schneiderlin (Everton) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by David de Gea.
Attempt saved. Sandro Ramírez (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Dominic Calvert-Lewin.

Goal!  Manchester United 3, Everton 0. Romelu Lukaku (Manchester United) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jesse Lingard with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Attempt blocked. Romelu Lukaku (Manchester United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Leighton Baines (Everton).
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Manchester United. Anthony Martial replaces Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Offside, Manchester United. Nemanja Matic tries a through ball, but Jesse Lingard is caught offside.
Offside, Everton. Sandro Ramírez tries a through ball, but Dominic Calvert-Lewin is caught offside.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Phil Jones (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Manchester United 2, Everton 0. Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Romelu Lukaku.
Substitution, Everton. Kevin Mirallas replaces Wayne Rooney.
Eric Bailly (Manchester United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Substitution, Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin replaces Idrissa Gueye.
